solution_line_template: Wallace already has {bags_already_made} bags of jerky, so he needs to make {customer_order_bags} - {bags_already_made} = <<{customer_order_bags}-{bags_already_made}={bags_needed_more}>>{bags_needed_more} bags more.
He can make {bags_per_batch} bags per day, so he needs {bags_needed_more} / {bags_per_batch} = {days_to_fulfill_order} days to fulfill the customer's order.
